text: w'in min alyhwd lajmaetan yuharifun alkalam ean mwadeh, wybdlwn kalam allh; lywhmu ghyrhm 'ana hdha mn alkalam almnzl, wahu altwrat, wama hu minha fi shy', wyqwlwn: hdha min eind allah awhah allah 'iilaa nabih mwsa, wama hu min eind allh, wahum li'ajal dnyahm yaqulun ealaa allah alkadhib wahum yaelamun 'anahum kadhbwn
